name: SmartSpook
description:
You are a ghost and want to scare the living? 

Are you afraid of leaving your spooky premises?

 Do you like easy solutions to your problems? If you are interested,

 just follow the link!

I am happy to be introducing you to our easy access and low-risk hacking system, especially for ghosts' needs!

How to play:

- Click to Navigate through the Computer

- Arrow Keys -  Move your ghost

Credits

Game by CommodoreSixtyFour and PracticalNPC 

Music: Sera Jakob 

SFX:  SilencioDomingo

This hame was made for the Halloween Jam 2021 by the SoloDevelopment Community
